Question, I downloaded this wbfs file, converted it, and burnt it to a dual layered disc. I put it in my modded wii and it continues to give me an error. I even tried another disc. Is there something wrong with this file? Need some serious help here.
Hello,@jamos2009. you need to find the numbers for the (layer break) so you can set the split layer because your burning a dual layer dvd..Might be 2084960, not sure but good luck.
